column5: For all of us newbies to Top-Water fishing.... can you veterans please post some pics for us of: 1) Fish you caught 2) pics of the type of water you are fishing in 3) pics & names of the lures you like  Here are a couple of my recent shots(23"  smallie):   and it was caught on the edge of this >   Locally, I am  using black / white / green  Scum Frogs in conditions like this:   with a dark frog , I caught this in the slop    Having a "blast"!  Not getting much sleep though, dreaming of the next BIG BLAST  Please post those pics of "blasts from the slop" if you can.  Thanks   Splashhopper
